name: Space Boss
description:
Destroy the boss, but not too quickly.  Rack up points by staying in the fight as long as possible. 

  • Score points by destroying the minions that the boss spawns
    • The boss begins spawning minions when you stop firing
  • Score even more points by destroying the tiny minions
    • Minions produce tiny minions when you remain still for a couple of seconds
  • Obtain a place on the high score list by scoring as many points as possible before destoying the boss
  • Only Boss-Defeaters are eligible for the high score list

How many points can you score against the boss before destroying him?
